statements: SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData;
SELECT species_name, ecosystem FROM BiodiversityData WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE ecosystem = 'Forest';
SELECT id, species_name, population_count FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem FROM BiodiversityData;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, SUM(population_count) AS total_population FROM BiodiversityData GROUP BY species_name HAVING total_population > 500;
SELECT species_name, ecosystem FROM BiodiversityData WHERE ecosystem IN ('Forest', 'Ocean') ORDER BY ecosystem, species_name;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' AND population_count BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT species_name, AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM BiodiversityData GROUP BY species_name HAVING avg_population < 100;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems;
SELECT id, name, location FROM ecosystems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM ecosystems WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM ecosystems ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM ecosystems INNER JOIN species ON ecosystems.id = species.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE location='Forest';
SELECT name, location FROM ecosystems WHERE id=1;
SELECT ecosystems.name, species.name FROM ecosystems INNER JOIN species ON ecosystems.id = species.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE ecosystem_id IN (SELECT id FROM ecosystems WHERE location='Mountain');
SELECT ecosystems.name AS ecosystem_name, species.name AS species_name FROM ecosystems INNER JOIN species ON ecosystems.id = species.ecosystem_id WHERE ecosystems.id=2;
SELECT * FROM species_population
SELECT name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE ecosystem_id = 1
SELECT id, name, description FROM ecosystems WHERE id = 2
SELECT scientific_name, name FROM species WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM species_population WHERE last_observed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM species JOIN species_population ON species.id = species_population.species_id
SELECT name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE ecosystem_id=1 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE description LIKE '%tropical%'
SELECT name, population_count FROM species_population INNER JOIN species ON species_population.species_id = species.id WHERE population_count > 1000
SELECT name, scientific_name, population_count FROM species INNER JOIN species_population ON species.id = species_population.species_id WHERE last_observed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, gender FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, ecosystem_id, species_type FROM Species WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT habitat_name, location FROM Habitats JOIN Ecosystems ON Habitats.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM Observations WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, gender FROM Species WHERE ecosystem_id = 2;
SELECT observation_date, observer_name FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT Species.species_name, Ecosystems.ecosystem_name FROM Species JOIN Ecosystems ON Species.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM Habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT id, name FROM Ecosystems ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, result, researcher_id FROM ResearchResults WHERE result LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, species_id, date_observed FROM Observations WHERE date_observed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ecosystem_id FROM Species WHERE ecosystem_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, rr.result AS observation_result FROM Researchers r JOIN ResearchResults rr ON r.id = rr.researcher_id;
SELECT s.name AS species_name, e.name AS ecosystem_name FROM Species s JOIN Ecosystems e ON s.ecosystem_id = e.id;

SELECT o.date_observed, r.name AS researcher_name, rr.result AS observation_result FROM Observations o JOIN Researchers r ON r.id = o.ecosystem_id JOIN ResearchResults rr ON o.id = rr.observation_id ORDER BY o.date_observed DESC;
